wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: Khoo-pih, huat-pòo kap thuân-pòo pún tsok
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Lí nā kái-tōng, piàn-khuán, ia̍h-sī kun-kù pún tsok tshòng-tsō, lí ka-thiam ē-tàng īng kap pún tsok kâng-khuán ia̍h-sī sann-tshiūnn ê hí-khó lâi huat-pòo tsuè--tshut-lâi ê tsok-phín.
